body.content:
Dearest One,

                            I'm Mrs. Caroline Hiz, from the United States
of America, a cancer patient widow of late Mr. Ken Hiz, former USA
ambassador in Malaysia. I would like to donate $4.5 million US dollars for
a charity project in your country. You have been chosen to execute the
charitable project in your country. Kindly contact me via my email address
for more details on the charitable project.

Contact email:       mrs.carolinehiz@aol.com
Remain blessed
Mrs. Caroline Hiz
